frontmatter.description: This chapter covers the configuration of the Edge Stack, including importing and deploying Edge Stack Custom Resource Definitions (CRDs) and YAML files. You will learn how to configure the necessary Ambassador Cloud license and set up essential components like Listener and Mapping resources. Finally, you will deploy a sample Quote service application to route traffic through Edge Stack.

frontmatter.courseTitle: Ambassador Edge Stack API Gateway with Meshery

frontmatter.chapterTitle: Interpreting the Edge Stack Meshery Design
